original_text: Then the land will yield its fruit, and you will eat your fill and live there in safety.
korean_text: 땅은 그것의 열매를 내리니 너희가 배불리 먹고 거기 안전하게 거주하리라

sentences.original_text: Then the land will yield its fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 땅이 그 열매를 맺을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and you will eat your fill
